attributes.action: Stop The Supreme Court's ruling that Pedophiles are allowed to adopt children
attributes.background: It is appalling that the Supreme Court over rules the Government in the protection and rights against abuse of children .The Pedophlies "human rights"as given by the Supreme Court to adopt children,should not take priority over the protection of children . Make it Law Pedophiles can't adopt children

rejection.details: There has been no change in the law, or Supreme Court ruling, that would allow convicted pedophiles to adopt children. We are therefore not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
